subject: New Member Hello
author: Rebecca
full_text:
Hi Everyone,

I'm Becca, and I'm a new member to the group. I live in S. GA. I'm a
wife, mother of one, artist (photographer, and professional
soap-artisan). I've had a life long interest in the
supernatural/paranormal/occult. I've looked into joining a few local
paranormal groups which have sprung up this year, but thus far haven't
entered membership level with either. Soooo, instead of just being
stagnant and doing nothing, I'm interested in putting together more
equipment/"know-how" from a techie standpoint of view for doing my own
investigations with family and close friends. (Pretty much all members
of my family are interested in this sort of phenomenon.) I have a very
techno-knowledgeable husband who could pretty much put together
whatever equipment we need. Of course, being that we're pretty much a
one income family, the more we can build ourselves, lowering the cost,
the better. ;)

I have lots of side interests, background, etc. but that sorta covers
where I'm coming from.

And yes, I'm finding all this information (out "there") so over
whelming!  Trying to figure out the right place to start. I do plan on
having my techie-hubby check out Frank's schematics, because I do hear
over and over that his box is still "da'bomb."  :D

Thanks!

Becca
